au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: AgBE_L2=1.5m_central_apx2p5mm
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(700,0) # Drive guide to g7 driveGuide(guideConfig.g7) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g7) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 2.5 mm sics.drive('apx', -0) #beamstop command removed in this config #selBs(1) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 96.9) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.2)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(21, 150) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(300) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(21, 0) driveBsz(258)
